Title: NakedChrome
Description: NakedChrome（すっぽんぽんくろーむ） launches Google Chrome with initial profile. After using it, NakedChrome roll-backs profile to the one using usually. It's developed in C#/WPF.
HomeWiki:
This project is for Google Chrome v16.0 or lower. Don't use it with current version of Google Chrome.

NakedChrome（すっぽんぽんくろーむ） launches Google Chrome with initial profile. After using it, NakedChrome roll-backs profile to the one using usually. It's developed in C#/WPF.

What is this ?

NakedChrome launched Google Chrome with the initial profile, not with the profile you are using every day. When you want to take a screenshot of DEFAULT Google Chrome, or when you try extension in plain environment, it helps you. After using DEFAULT Google Chrome, NakedChrome set Google Chromes' profile to the one witch you are using.

.NET Framework 4 is required.

How to use ?

  • Launch and Kill Google Chrome's Process and Launch Naked Chrome.
  • Use from Jump List without UI (Windows 7 only).
